quote: 想像力比知識更重要。(Imagination is more important than knowledge.)
author: 阿爾伯特·愛因斯坦 (Albert Einstein)

quote: 我思故我在。(Cogito, ergo sum / I think, therefore I am.)
author: 勒內·笛卡爾 (René Descartes)

quote: 人生苦短，我用 Python。(Life is short, you need Python.)
author: Bruce Eckel (常被程式設計師社群引用此變體)

quote: 求知若飢，虛心若愚。(Stay hungry. Stay foolish.)
author: 史蒂夫·賈伯斯 (Steve Jobs) (引用自《全球概覽》)
work: 史丹佛大學畢業典禮演講

quote: 政府之於民，猶水之於魚。(Government of the people, by the people, for the people.)
author: 亞伯拉罕·林肯 (Abraham Lincoln)

quote: 知識就是力量。(Knowledge is power.)
author: 法蘭西斯·培根 (Francis Bacon)
work: 《沉思錄》(Meditationes Sacrae) (重複 be006，但作為單獨名人名言亦可)

quote: 吾愛吾師，吾更愛真理。(Amicus Plato, amicus Aristoteles, sed magis amica veritas. / Plato is my friend, Aristotle is my friend, but my best friend is truth.)
author: 艾薩克·牛頓 (Isaac Newton) (改編自亞里斯多德)

quote: 讀萬卷書，行萬里路。(Read ten thousand books, travel ten thousand miles.)
author: 董其昌 (Dong Qichang)

quote: 給我一個支點，我可以舉起整個地球。(Give me a place to stand, and I shall move the Earth.)
author: 阿基米德 (Archimedes)
work: 古希臘科學家 (關於槓桿原理)

quote: 筆尖有利劍。(The pen is mightier than the sword.)
author: 愛德華·布爾沃-李頓 (Edward Bulwer-Lytton)

quote: 人人生而平等。(All men are created equal.)
author: 托馬斯·傑弗遜 (Thomas Jefferson)
work: 美國獨立宣言 (United States Declaration of Independence)

quote: 這是我個人的一小步，卻是人類的一大步。(That's one small step for a man, one giant leap for mankind.)
author: 尼爾·阿姆斯壯 (Neil Armstrong)

quote: 我有一個夢想。(I have a dream.)
author: 馬丁·路德·金 (Martin Luther King Jr.)

quote: 生存還是毀滅，這是一個值得考慮的問題。(To be, or not to be, that is the question.)
author: 威廉·莎士比亞 (William Shakespeare)

quote: 簡單是終極的複雜。(Simplicity is the ultimate sophistication.)
author: 李奧納多·達文西 (Leonardo da Vinci) (重複 lp022，因其非常著名)

quote: 唯一限制我們實現明天夢想的，是我們今天的疑慮。(The only limit to our realization of tomorrow will be our doubts of today.)
author: 富蘭克林·D·羅斯福 (Franklin D. Roosevelt) (重複 pg013，因其廣泛性)

quote: 成為你想看到的改變。(Be the change that you wish to see in the world.)
author: 聖雄甘地 (Mahatma Gandhi) (重複 pg003，因其普適性)

quote: 如果你評判他人，你就沒有時間去愛他們。(If you judge people, you have no time to love them.)
author: 德蕾莎修女 (Mother Teresa)

quote: 羅馬不是一天造成的。(Rome wasn't built in a day.)
author: 約翰·海伍德 (John Heywood) (收集的諺語)

quote: 機會垂青有準備的人。(Chance favors the prepared mind.)
author: 路易·巴斯德 (Louis Pasteur)

quote: 無知不是恥辱，不願學習才是。(Ignorance is not a shame, but disinclination to learn is.)
author: 班傑明·富蘭克林 (Benjamin Franklin)

quote: 天才百分之一是靈感，百分之九十九是汗水。(Genius is one percent inspiration and ninety-nine percent perspiration.)
author: 湯瑪斯·愛迪生 (Thomas A. Edison)

quote: 寧鳴而死，不默而生。(Better to die on your feet than live on your knees.)
author: 埃米利亞諾·薩帕塔 (Emiliano Zapata) (墨西哥革命家，或更早來源)

quote: 條條大路通羅馬。(All roads lead to Rome.)
author: 古羅馬諺語 (Roman Proverb)

quote: 欲速則不達。(More haste, less speed.)
author: 孔子 (Confucius) (《論語》中的思想)

quote: 實踐是檢驗真理的唯一標準。(Practice is the sole criterion for testing truth.)
author: 卡爾·馬克思 (Karl Marx) / 毛澤東 (Mao Zedong) (在中國廣為流傳)

quote: 上帝助自助者。(God helps those who help themselves.)
author: 班傑明·富蘭克林 (Benjamin Franklin) (在其《窮理查年鑑》中推廣)

quote: 人生得意須盡歡，莫使金樽空對月。(Enjoy life while you can, don't let your gold cup be empty to the moon.)
author: 李白 (Li Bai)

quote: 時間就是金錢。(Time is money.)
author: 班傑明·富蘭克林 (Benjamin Franklin)

quote: 哪裡有愛，哪裡就有生命。(Where there is love there is life.)
author: 聖雄甘地 (Mahatma Gandhi)
